column2:
"Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones.
My fears were completely unfounded, then."

"Autowords not only lets you shout out battle
cries, it also lets you warn others of danger,
like if you get taken by surprise."

"Some ARKS members find really unique uses
for it. You'd be missing out if you didn't jump
in the game."

"Heh. This reminds me of this one time, in the
old days, when I forgot my autowords were on... "

"うむ、よろしい！
やはり君は優秀なアークスだな。
杞憂で済んでよかった。"

"オートワードを用いれば
かけ声のみならず、不意の状況でも
危険を知らせることが可能だ！"

"ユニークな使い方をするアークスも
居ることだし、使わなければ損と
言ってしまっても問題ないだろう！"
"いいか、私も当初は羞恥心が……"
